traceability.evidence: The implementation lives in src/update-packages.js (called from print-outdated.js when updateMode=true), parseOptions supports --update and --yes flags, and the CLI help text lists them. Unit tests tagged with “Story: prompts/011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE.md” cover the happy-path update (printOutdated.update.test.js), empty/safe-rows path, prompt-abort flow (printOutdated.updatePromptAbort.test.js), and backup-error handling (printOutdated.updateBackupError.test.js). Logging of the preview, confirmation, summary message (“Updated package.json with X safe packages”), and the post-update “Run 'npm install'” prompt are all validated.
